markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs=""
>
[Malleable Mixture](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1263)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 19</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your bones, muscles, and organs become vastly softer and more pliable. You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were smaller than your normal size, and you gain an item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Malleable Mixture (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 19</row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were 1 size smaller than your normal size (minimum Small). The bonus to your DCs is +2, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Malleable Mixture (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 19</row>

**Price** 750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You can fit into and through small or narrow spaces as though you were 2 sizes smaller than your normal size (minimum Tiny). The bonus to your DCs is +3, and the duration is 10 minutes.
name: Malleable Mixture (Lesser)
